metadata.title: CVE-2023-20910 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: In add of WifiNetworkSuggestionsManager.java, there is a possible way to trigger permanent DoS due to resource exhaustion. This could lead to local denial of service with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.

criterions.comment: android-platform-frameworks-base package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
